page.title: 20Two People From Great Chart
page.content: Mrs.Swaffer is a Parish Councillor and Chairman of the Governors of our school.Mr.Swaffer is Chairman of the Cricket Club.We asked them lots of questions about how much the village has changed.There used to be four shops,one used to be the forge,one used to be where Chart Glass is,one is where the hairdresser is and one where the allotments are.Twenty years ago a new Methodist Church was built because the old one had no running water and no electricity and it was too small. An artist bought the old one for a studio and has now sold it.They are now making it into a house,down Chapel Lane.A new BMX track is being planned but it could be a hazard because there will be a lot of cars about.In 50 years time it could become part of Ashford or may stay as a village.
